products.title: KitchenAid - 27 Cu. Ft. French Door Refrigerator - Stainless Steel
products.description: This 26.8 cu. ft. french door refrigerator helps fresh produce stay that way with the ExtendFresh Temperature Management System. A pull-out tray accommodates large platters with ease, while a FreshChill Temperature-Controlled Full-Width Pantry lets you optimize temperature and airflow for the specific food you're storing. The refined interior design features elegant metallic accents, and a PrintShield finish resists exterior smudges.

products.title: Insignia™ - 18 Cu. Ft. Top-Freezer Refrigerator with ENERGY STAR Certification - Stainless Steel
products.description:
The Insignia NS-RTM18SS2 18 Cu. Ft. Top-Freezer Refrigerator has a
 separate top freezer compartment to store your frozen treats and 
keep them organized on shelves or in the door trays. The fridge has 
three shelves to organize your food, with two that adjust to fit taller
 items. Door trays comfortably store your bottles and condiments, 
even 1-gallon jugs, and the humidity-controlled crisper drawers 
keep fruits and vegetables fresh. The refrigerator is also internally
 lit so you can find items easily.

products.title: Café - 28.7 Cu. Ft. 4-Door French Door Smart Refrigerator with Dual Dispense Autofill Pitcher - Stainless Steel
products.description:
Nothing about your personal style is standard. So why should your
 appliances be? Cafe redefines the kitchen space with the
 Customizable Professional Collection, which gives you the ability to
 pair matte white, matte black or stainless appliance finishes with
 your choice of six distinct handle and knob options. Cafe curated
 hardware offerings include brushed bronze, brushed black,
 brushed copper, and brushed stainless, alongside the latest bold
 additions, brushed brass and flat black.  Get the look that truly
 reflects your personality with Cafe's unique finishes and exceptional
 styling.
features: Keep your Leafy Greens Twice as Long*

products.title: Samsung - BESPOKE 23 cu. ft. 4-Door French Door Counter Depth Smart Refrigerator with Family Hub - Matte Black Steel
products.description:
Counter Depth 4-Door French Door Refrigerator with customizable
 and changeable door panels available in a variety of colors and
 finishes featuring Samsung’s Family Hub which lets you see inside
 your refrigerator, manage your family’s calendars, stream music,
 see who’s at the front door and much more, all right from your
 fridge. It also features the Beverage Center with both a water dispenser
 and AutoFill Water Pitcher. Plus a Dual Ice Maker with
 cubed ice and Ice Bites.
features: Dual Ice Maker with Ice Bites

products.title: LG - Counter-Depth MAX 24.5 Cu. Ft. 4-Door French Door Smart Refrigerator with Full-Convert Drawer - Stainless Steel
products.description:
This 4-door Counter-Depth MAX refrigerator doesn’t just give you
 space — it brings a new level of organization, flexibility and style to
 your kitchen. Sleek flat-panel doors with dual handle design for
 easy opening add a premium feel. A slam-resistant door design 
allows the refrigerator doors to close softly and quietly. French 
doors offer easy access to fresh foods, while double drawers below
 means no more rummaging through stacks of frozen items. The 
versatile Full-Convert Drawer converts from fridge to freezer with
 just a touch. Five temperature settings provide optimal storage for
 a range of fresh or frozen items.

products.title: Whirlpool - 18.2 Cu. Ft. Top-Freezer Refrigerator - White
products.description:
With wall-to-wall frameless glass shelves, humidity-controlled
 crispers, a Flexi-Slide bin and gallon-size door storage, this 18.2 cu.
 ft. Whirlpool WRT318FZDW top-freezer refrigerator provides plenty
 of room to house your groceries.

products.title: Chefman - Lightning 1.8L Custom-Temp Electric Kettle with Tea Infuser - Stainless Steel
products.description:
The Chefman Lightning 1.8L Custom-Temp Kettle
 heats water lightning-fast for hot beverages, soup,
 ramen, oatmeal and more! Heating up to 25%
 faster than a glass tea kettle with lower wattage,
 you can boil 2 cups of water in as little as two
 minutes. Use the electric kettle temperature
 control to choose your preferred temperature or 
select the preset “Boil” option.

products.title: Hamilton Beach - Kettle - Stainless Steel
products.description:
Prepare soothing hot drinks with this 1.7L
 Hamilton Beach glass kettle. The auto-shut
 off function and boil-dry protection offer
 safety and easy operation, while the built-in
 mesh filter keeps your beverage limescale-
free.

specs.dimensions: 9.9 x 8.6 x 6.3 (H x W x D) in

products.title: Roku - 32" Class Select Series Full HD Smart RokuTV
products.description:
Roku Select Series Full HD TVs are thoughtfully designed for a
 delightful entertainment experience at an incredible value. Enjoy
 your streaming favorites in bright, full HD picture and catch every
 word with sound features like auto speech clarity and night mode.
 Switch to your inputs and watch free live TV right from the home
 screen, or use the voice remote to find movies, shows, or songs
 across thousands of streaming apps.

specs.dimensions: 19 x 28.9 x 7.6 (H x W x D) in

products.title: Samsung - 65” Class DU7200 Series Crystal UHD 4K Smart Tizen TV (2024)
products.description:
This essential TV features a range of contrast and color and smart
 capabilities. Enjoy your content with richer details, brighter images
 and clearer resolution with 4K Upscaling.
